name: 高等工業教育研究法
goals: 瞭解教育研究方法概念與理論
分析、統整及運用各種技職教育研究方法
瞭解國內外技職教育研究之現況、趨勢及相關議題
評析國內外技職教育相關研究論文或報告
規劃技職教育研究主題及撰擬研究計畫
syllabus:
1

Course Introduction and Orientation

2

Introduction to Educational Research

3

Selecting and Defining Research Plan

4

Methods for Locating and Collecting Research Information

5

Reviewing the Literature

6

Preparing and Evaluating A Research Plan

7

Selecting A Sample

8

Selecting Measuring Instruments

9

Survey Research

10

Correlational Research

11

Causal-Comparative Research

12

Experimental Research

13

Qualitative Data Collection

14

Case Study Research

15

Qualitative research: Data Analysis and Interpretation

16

Mixed Methods Research: Integrating Qualitative and Quantitative Methods

17

Action Research

18

Final Examination

grading.note: 完成一量化研究、一質性研究

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
